text: now that I have your attention ever wondered what would happen if a classic Zelda veteran and a stardew valley Fanboy decided to have a lubed up hackathon no congrats you're not a freak but for those of you who do be freaks I'm of course talking about the indie game drop known as forager a small game so big that has been itching at the back of my sleep-deprived mind melon since my return to YouTube because slave is overrated I have a monthly video quota to fail for you with all that said let's get into the very legitimate and actual story of the game that is most definitely Canon and not just made up by me for shits and or giggles foreign forager you are a pickaxe wielding Maniac known as me can I sue for this I feel like I can sue for this well until we find out the legalities of this blatant theft let's move on to that juicy lore so Your Story begins as most stories do completely isolated on an island the size of three U-Haul trucks equipped with nothing but your trusty pickaxe and
title: A Dipshits Guide To Forager
author: Demonetized™

text: on an island the size of three U-Haul trucks equipped with nothing but your trusty pickaxe and crippling depression and you have but one goal to achieve the one goal that since the start of our evolutionary chain we have questioned and aim to answer so that we may pave the way for the next generation of peoples to live a better and more fulfilling life and that goal my sweet children Hayes capitalism [Music] [Applause] foreign because if your hands aren't making money then they ain't working peasants to achieve the goal of reaching musk levels of Bitcoin you must track around your tiny Island performing tasks such as stealing the land's natural resources completing quests provided by the weird ass NPCs and killing anything with a pulse this in turn will help you progress by providing our Lord and savior exp which after leveling up allows you to unlock a plethora of skills that lay somewhere between completely useless and full on sexy time after some time passes you start discovering
title: A Dipshits Guide To Forager

text: between completely useless and full on sexy time after some time passes you start discovering temples from a long lost bygone ERA with puzzles to solve and bosses to kill some of these hold rods with Majestic abilities one such Rod shoots chain lightning that destroys multiple resources at once making the pickaxe completely pointless some may call this the Thunder ride but I prefer its proper name [Music] you know [Music] now while I do love me some good old Bean Boy 7000 I would be a douche not to include the other three rods the one that shoots Fireballs the one that shoots ice cubes and the one that spawns skeletons yeah they're uh there's something [Music] skeleton one's pretty neat moving on you continue your Escapade until you started amassing enough technology to automate Dam near everything and enough slaves oh sorry I mean droids to essentially make the game into a walking simulator where all you have to do is wait until the game decides to give you the goodies and oh boy does
title: A Dipshits Guide To Forager

text: where all you have to do is wait until the game decides to give you the goodies and oh boy does this game love waiting but don't worry for if sitting on your ass watching paint dry ain't exactly your cup of PG tips you can hop into a dungeon for a while and have some fun motorizing the masses and when you return to your freshly painted wall you too shall learn that time completely stops in the Overworld anytime you're not there forcing you to sit there for hours on end waiting for a bunch of crafting to finish like you're at a local laundromat with a bin bag full of clothes during a rush hour but alas after losing hours of your lifespan and killing a genocide's worth of skeletons and slimes you sit comfortably upon your throne as the millionaire you are and come to the sad realization that now you have literally nothing else to do in this world world [Music] okay so normally this segment is pretty damn long but forager is an indie game so the gameplay Loop is pretty simple this shade
title: A Dipshits Guide To Forager

text: is pretty damn long but forager is an indie game so the gameplay Loop is pretty simple this shade ain't NASA doing a thing gets the XP which lets you level up which then lets you get a new skill which then makes it easier to get XP to level up to get a skill which makes it easier oh God my head uh don't worry though there do be mini mechanics or as I like to refer to them as Molly Max like damn near everything in this game is useful in one way or another except you you disgust me get out whose ass did this idea come from put it back some examples are that the thunder rod can be used to speed up objects in the world by shooting at them like it's loaded with lightning flavor cocaine and notice the fact that the skeleton staff can be abused in the mid game once you've unlocked infinite charge to essentially have an easy way to grind exp and money at the same time and last but nevertheless the 500 poop Quest can be a pain in the ass right up until you find out that Force feeding cows yes
title: A Dipshits Guide To Forager

text: the 500 poop Quest can be a pain in the ass right up until you find out that Force feeding cows yes they are cows not pigs shut up horse feeding the cows animal feed makes them crap Stacks that would make a South Park Rider blush there are many cool little details like this in the game that trivialize most of the challenges once you've learned them well all of them except one of course [Music] okay so let me level with you there's like three people in this world that changed me on a spiritual level I wake up in the morning and boom I chose violence those people are the men who invented loot boxes real-time crafting and the four kids edit of one piece and oh boy does that real-time crafting be showing its fat Rosy ass cheeks and full display here sixty percent of my play time alone was dedicated to sitting around and doing absolutely nothing because as I said earlier the Overworld is like an emotionally damaged co-worker that won't do until they're given validation because me right how
title: A Dipshits Guide To Forager
author: Demonetized™

text: an emotionally damaged co-worker that won't do until they're given validation because me right how dare I want to go into the endless murder time black hole and go on a rampage as I wait how dare I want to solve some puzzles for a few hours how dare I want to have fun yo man who hurt you shut up don't get me wrong the game is great and a ton of fun if you're okay with taking things slow but I for one didn't enjoy being bottlenecked into sitting around staring at completion bars filming for eight hours straight could you even imagine what you could do with eight hours you could binge my other videos you could subscribe to my Channel or even take a minute to comment about how lazy this Segway is but above all else I could have done a video on Bioshock instead because hindsight is a thanks for watching and bye bye [Music]
